devdoc.author: Orange Finance
devdoc.details: Stryke Handler has reserveCooldown for each user and position id, therefore, to avoid reserve conflict, we have to create a new ReserveHelper for each user.

batchReserveLiquidity(address,(address,a.details: Batch reserves liquidity for the given handler and user.to use this function: 1. Create a new reserve helper for the given handler and user. 2. Set the initialized helper as the operator for the handler using `setOperator` function.

params.handler: The handler to batch reserve liquidity for.
params.reserveLiquidityParams: The parameters for the reserve liquidity.

batchWithdrawReserveLiquidity(address,ui.details: Withdraws the reserved liquidity for the given handler and user. user specifies tokenIds, then helper will withdraw the liquidity for each position.each withdrawable liquidity amount is stored in the helper storage. you can only pass the tokenIds that are stored in the helper storage.tokenIds can be obtained by calling `getReservedTokenIds` function of the helper.

params.handler: The handler to withdraw the reserved liquidity for.
params.tokenIds: The token ids of the positions to withdraw the reserved liquidity for.

createMyReserveHelper().details: Creates a new reserve helper for the given user.

devdoc.title: ReserveProxy

userdoc.notice: Routes the reserve liquidity requests to the correct ReserveHelper.
